傱字的基本解释

傱
sǒng
〔傱傱〕ａ．疾速前进的样子，如“风傱傱而扶辖兮”。ｂ．众多的样子，如“骑沓沓，般傱傱”。

傱字的汉语字典释义

[①]［sǒng］
［《廣韻》息拱切，上腫，心。］
(1)行貌。
(2)见“傱傱”。
(3)通“慫”。参见“傱勇”。

傱字的康熙字典解释

【子集中】【人字部】　傱； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页114第17
【集韻】【韻會】?荀勇切，音竦。疾貌。【揚雄·甘泉賦】風傱傱以扶轄。【註】師古曰：前進意。　又叶疾容切，音從。【玉篇】傱傱，走貌。【前漢·郊祀歌】神之行，旌容容，騎沓沓，般傱傱。

傱字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体旧字形
傱字的起名意思

暂无。

傱
Basic explanation of words
傱
sǒng
〔傱傱〕a. The appearance of advancing quickly, such as "Wind 傱傱傱, and support Xi". b. Numerous appearances, such as "riding a taunt, like a cuddly".
傱
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［sǒng］
["Guangyun" has a swollen upper part and a heart. ]
(1) Appearance.
(2) See "傱傱".
(3) Through "counsel". See "Daoyong".
傱
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Subset] [Human Character Department] 　傱; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 114 Page 17
[Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? Xun Yong cuts, the sound is upset. Ill appearance. 【Yang Xiong·Ganquan Fu】Feng 傱傱 to support the jurisdiction. [Note] Shi Gu said: Forward intention.　 Ye Ji Rong Qi again, Yin Cong. [Jade articles] 傱傱, take a look. [Previous Han · Jiao Si Song] God's Journey, Jingrongrong, Riding Tatu, Bangli.
